revision.revremark: Initial version for Uhlenbrock_73xx5.xml. Based on Piko help desk supplied datasheet
Add CVs for PWM modulations, Add SUSI output tooltips

variable.label: S-CLK:
variable.tooltip: Output SUSI CLK (A4 logic, CV50 Bit4=1 or activate Servo1)
Ausgang SUSI CLK (A4 Logik/CV50 Bit4=1 oder Servo1 aktivieren)

variable.label: S-DATA:
variable.tooltip: Output SUSI DATA (A3 logic, CV50 Bit4=1 or activate Servo2)
Ausgang SUSI CLK (A3 Logik/CV50 Bit4=1 oder Servo2 aktivieren)
